title: *Sun-Drenched 1-Bedroom Apt w/Skyline Views-Luxury Building* 329 1505
posting_body: ["*I Can Show You ALL the Available Units in This Building And ALL of Rentopia's Properties ||", 'NO BROKER FEE*', 'We have a great relationship with this landlord and we are the best point of contact for this building', 'BRAND NEW CONSTRUCTION IN PRIME WILLIAMSBURG', '*Sun-Drenched 1-Bedroom Apt w/Skyline Views-Luxury Building*', 'The pictures are for illustration purposes only - the unit is similar to the pictures in the listing', '*SEPTEMBER 1ST MOVE-IN*', '*The Building Features:*', 'State-of-the-art Fitness Facility / Rooftop Terrace / Outdoor Terrace with Grills on the 6th Floor / Indoor Lounge / Laundry Facility / On-site Parking Garage* / Bike Storage / Storage / High Speed Internet in All the Units / Elevators /', '*The Apartment Features:*', '1 Queen-Size Bedroom / Bathroom with Modern Fixtures, Stone and Tile Finishes, and a Deep Soaking Tub / Floor-to-Ceiling Windows with Amazing Skyline Views / Lots of Natural Light', "Throughout / Great Living Space for Entertaining / Ample Closet Space / Central Air Conditioning / Open Concept Kitchen with Brand New Modern Appliances including a Dishwasher / Wide Chef's Kitchen Island / High Ceilings / Oak Plank Flooring / Video Intercom /", "Enjoy the Best Things that Williamsburg has to offer: Domino Park, North 5th Street Pier and Park, McCarren Park, Williamsburg Bridge, Peter Luger Steak House, The West Brooklyn, Shalom Japan, St. Anselm, Sunday In Brooklyn, Oslo Coffee Roasters, Pies 'n' Thighs, Zona Rosa, Fette Sau", 'The Rosemont, Testo', 'Located a Step Away from the J/MZ Trains at Marcy Ave Station', 'A Short walk to the G Train at Broadway Station and the L Train at Metropolitan Ave Station', '*Good credit history 700+ and a combined annual income of $172,000+ (40x times the rent) are required / Personal guarantors are welcome!', '"Insurent" is accepted on a case by case basis*']
